A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So far this new trilogy is only marginally better than the prequel one. The only decent bit here was Luke's story arc. The subplot is pointless and there are several truly cringe-worthy moments (ie. the kiss). As usual\, the humour is humourless\, its overrun with pointless creatures purely there so they can sell toys and its crammed with more SJW signalling than a Berkeley Politics class. And most criminal of all\, Darth Vader's successor is a wimp.\n\"Yoda: The greatest teacher\, failure is.\"
